content: {"name": "Harvest House-Detroit Friendship", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.detroitfriendshiphouse.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "9540 Conant St", "address_2": "", "city": "Hamtramck", "state_province": null, "postal_code": "48212", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3984, "longitude": -83.049625}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 871-7443", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
